name: Flower (itch)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 39: Running out of Power

Controls:

  • move with arrow keys
  • jump with x (you have to activate it in game first)
  • interact with c
  • quit with esc

Tools I used:

  • Framework: Love2d
  • Language: Lua
  • Editor: Atom
  • Art: Clip Studio Paint
  • Recording: Audacity

(you'll need love2d to run the .love on mac or linux)

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/flower
